Description:
Verify that it is NOT possible to drop an item onto itself or its
      immediate parent or child

Verify that dragging a large (e.g. 5 MB) image across
      browser windows, to desktop, and into mail message
      works properly.

Verify that you can move around pages with the up and down arrow
        keys
Don't ever show 302 redirects in history

Verify that when you disable password manager from the preferences
      panel, you no longer are asked if you would like to save passwords and
      longer get prefilled info on sites
Print a test page and check to see if it prints properly
Determine if  top web sites print properly

Use of the XUL file picker on Linux to navigate through 
        directories and open files (html, plaintext, image). Resizing,
        selection/scrolling, cancellation also tested. Test last
        directory-viewed.
